nodes.title: about me
nodes.info:
My name is Gabriel Fono , and  I work for Dulles International Airport.
I graduated with the Bachelor degree in Civil Engineering in 2017 and decided to teach myself code.
I have a strong knowledge in math and problem solving.
I am a founder of Coding Mindset Community group on Facebook where people  come in  together and share their thought about coding.
I own different blogs related to tech where people learn about web development and programming.
I love to spend time with friends and families.
Also, in my spare time, I love solving math problems, watching videos, reading and  writing  blogs related to tech.
In addition, I really enjoy going to the Gym. My favorite sport is boxing. 
I am a self taught web developer with a lot of passion for coding.
My stack is HTML,CSS, JavaScript, React,Node.js and Gatsby.js.
I also use third party service backend such as contentful and strapi since those services are connected with Sql database . In addition, I use a service called cloudinary.com to store images and videos.
I also use Gulp and Wepback to minify my html,css, js files,images and videos specifically when  the project I work on is built with JS so that it can be ready for production.
I am very proficient with version control like Git, and I use Github to host all my source code online so that the  entire world can have access.
I am currently reinforce my knowledge on Algorithms and Datastructure in addition to focusing more on node.js and sql.
Furthermore, I have an additional skills regarding Marketing. For instance, I know how to work with Google analytic, Google ads and Facebook ads. I understand how  Search engine optimization works.
